title: Average ticket price Orlando Magic ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008/09 to 2009/10, slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2011/12, and finally gradually decreasing from 2011/12 to 2013/14.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009/10 and 2010/11.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 43.65 was reached at Year 2011/12
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 39.4 was reported at Year 2013/14
